Reviews.Title: Works better as a webcam
Reviews.Author: Kilroy
Reviews.Content: I ended up hooking this thing up to my PC and using it for video-chat. And, to be honest, you can't blame the camera if it's not up to the task for the actual gaming part, the technology just hasn't been perfected yet.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: jenbehere
Reviews.Content: Cant get it to work. I plug it in and the blue light comes on but it shuts of when the Wii game is ready....not happy with this item.

Reviews.Title: My camera
Reviews.Author: Jo ann linville
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with my shape video. plus I think the camera interacts with some other games so it is great.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: suitedjd
Reviews.Content: i been looking for a cam for the wii and and this one works great with some games.But i also heard that it works great with the pc but can't say for sure.
